text: @SpeakerPelosi @SenSchumer Politicizing and inflaming the fear and uncertainty surrounding the Wuhan Corona Virus to score cheap political points against the President. Just like she said she wouldn't do. Even though the homeless in her district are a greater threat to her constituents then even she is.
